gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Bulls 104, Trail Blazers 96
gameRecap.excerpt: The Bulls defeated the Trail Blazers, 104-96. DeMar DeRozan recorded 20 points, seven rebounds and six assists for the Bulls, while Coby White added 15 points, five rebounds and nine assists in the victory. Jerami Grant (24 points, seven rebounds) and Deandre Ayton (22 points, 12 rebounds) combined for 46 points for the Trail Blazers in the losing effort. The Bulls improve to 22-25 on the season, while the Trail Blazers fall to 13-33.
